theme.description: The overall theme or narrative arc of the scene (e.g., 'vacation', 'conflict resolution').

setting.description: The physical or contextual setting where the scene takes place.

NPC.description: List of non-playable characters involved in the scene.

current_scene.description: Detailed description of the current scene's events.

previous_summary.description: A summary of what occurred in the previous scene.

character_1_goal.description: Current objective or desire of character 1.

character_2_goal.description: Current objective or desire of character 2.

scene_conflict.description: The central point of tension or conflict in the scene.
